ðŸ“– Summary: Element Blur & Highlight Extension is a browser extension that allows users to selectively blur or highlight elements, text, or custom regions on any webpage. It offers dual modes for blurring and highlighting, with controls for color, opacity, and intensity, along with undo/redo functionality and screenshot capabilities.
